Author: crazyscranton
Text: she’s out running errands for the next hour! good idea though - I’ll call a friend or something so I can’t go purge :) hope you’re having a nice day!

Author: YouGoatToBeKittenMe
Text: If you want to not purge, watch the movie with your mom so you won't want to pause the movie since you'd be pausing it for your mom too. Could help, good luck!
